description: Welcome to this spectacular independent house in Navacerrada! This exclusive chalet has optimal differential elements that make it unique in its class. It has been renovated and is ready to move into. The Velux windows, the doors with 6+6 double security glass and gas insulating chamber and the alarm system throughout the house guarantee your safety and peace of mind. The central solid oak staircase is a true work of art. The new roofs with the best slate in Europe and double thermal insulation (+ - 8 degrees) ensure maximum comfort. Upon arriving at the house, you will be surprised by the granite cobblestone path that leads to the home. Inside, the plumbing is new in all the bathrooms and the rain showers will provide you with a unique experience. In addition, the built-in wardrobes in all bedrooms will allow you to keep everything in order. With four bedrooms plus a games room distributed over two floors, three bathrooms, two living rooms and a dining room, a bedroom on the ground floor and a kitchen with multiple possibilities, you will have more than enough space for the whole family. The house has a lot of light and a plot of two thousand meters with a garden area and swimming pool. It also has a separate guest house, ideal for entertaining your friends and family. The orientation is ideal and communications with Madrid are excellent. In addition, you can enjoy offers on leisure and restaurants in the area. In total, the house has 305 m² built and 246 m² useful. It has 5 bedrooms, 5 bathrooms, terrace, balcony, storage room and South and East orientation. The plot is 2,717 m². Don't miss the opportunity to live in this wonderful house!

Gilmar offers an exclusive villa for sale in the " Cercas Mayores " Urbanization, in the center of Navacerrada. The house has six bedrooms and two bathrooms plus a toilet. Large porch of one hundred and twenty square meters and solarium, kitchen with views of the pool, garage, ceramic floor and wooden windows. Own pool in the house and garden area. Excellent orientation and located in the center of town. Porcelain floor and unique differential elements. Tennis and paddle tennis courts. Ready to move into and with high qualities. If you are interested in this house, do not hesitate to contact us, we will gladly assist you, we will explain in detail all the information you need and if you wish you can visit it without obligation. WE GET THE MAXIMUM FINANCING WITH THE BEST CONDITIONS AT NO COST TO THE BUYER! WE DO NOT CHARGE THE BUYER" IF YOU WANT TO SELL YOUR HOUSE… CALL US! “At GILMAR we work to offer our clients the best properties, with specialized teams in each area to provide them with the best option for their needs, with all the excellence and taking maximum care of the details. In more than 30 years of existence, Gilmar has managed to achieve a privileged space within the high standing Real Estate Sector. We cover all real estate needs: homes, offices, commercial premises, plots, rustic land, land to build.. . Our clients have the necessary advice from the beginning, to guarantee their security, legal effectiveness and the best financial-fiscal profitability. Great opportunity to get your home tailored to your dreams.

Sale of beautiful semi-detached house in Navacerrada. GILMAR VILLALBA sells a beautiful Semi-detached House in the town of Navacerrada of 220 m2 on a 251 m2 plot and with access to magnificent common areas, with a green recreational area, swimming pool and paddle court. The state of conservation and qualities are excellent to enter tomorrow. Its location is perfect since you can go to the center of the town as it is next door and at the same time with beautiful views of the mountain. It has 5 bedrooms (one of them on the street level), 3 bathrooms, 1 living room, 1 kitchen, south facing, 1 garage space. A LUXURY HOME IN NAVACERRADA! DISTRIBUTION: GROUND FLOOR: garage, hall, bedroom, kitchen with access to terrace, L-shaped living room with access to the garden, bathroom with shower and closet under stairs FIRST FLOOR: bedroom, bedroom, full bathroom, bedroom, master en-suite with dressing room and large bathroom with shower ATTIC: open plan living room and storage room. CHARACTERISTICS: Interior carpentry: lacquered wood Exterior carpentry: pvc Heating: individual natural gas Pool Tennis-Padel At GILMAR we work to offer our clients the best properties, with specialized teams in each area to provide them with the best option for their needs, with all the excellence and taking maximum care of the details. This impressive chalet stands out for its striking distribution, creating a cozy atmosphere and an unparalleled feeling of spaciousness. Located in a quiet area, near a charming lake, this home is a true gem. The spaciousness of the home not only translates into generous spaces, but also offers the advantage of being at the point where you can finish the last details to your liking, allowing for personalized adaptations and renovations to meet your specific needs. Surrounded by a garden and elevated in height, it provides a stunning panoramic view of the town and the majestic surrounding mountains. The privileged location facilitates access to both the center of Navacerrada and mountain routes, creating the perfect environment to disconnect and enjoy nature. Each bedroom has its own bathroom, in addition to another on the main floor. The double-height living room and the possibility of an open American-style kitchen add a contemporary and elegant touch. In addition, the property includes a covered garage and a basement with two separate rooms, offering flexibility to adapt these spaces according to your needs, even to make a home since it has a separate entrance. At the back of the house, the large garden offers the possibility of installing a swimming pool, even with the option of covering it, making the most of the available space. For any questions or to arrange a visit and personally discover all the wonders that this chalet has to offer, do not hesitate to contact us. We are here to help you find the home of your dreams. And remember, at Grupo Avanza, we do not charge fees to the buyer. We are waiting for you!

^*UNIQUE PROPERTY! *^FANTASTIC STONE VILLA IN ONE OF THE MOST BEAUTIFUL VILLAGES IN THE SIERRA DE MADRID. ^**^ Just 30 minutes from Madrid. In the middle of nature in the center of the town of Navacerrada and just 50 meters from the reservoir, with unique views of Maliciosa and Bola del Mundo. The house of more than 600 square meters with large walls distributed on two floors with many spaces and many possibilities to configure it to suit each one, 9 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms and two living rooms with fireplace This emblematic property has a 2000 square meter plot with a large 20 meter long pool. A wonderful house in one of the most beautiful villages in the Sierra de Madrid. Due to its uniqueness, views and location, it makes this property a unique house. Visit it, you will love it….

In 2017, the prestigious architecture studio Schneider Colao converted a typical home from the mountain area, made of granite and slate, into a unique property where intimate spaces are valued, inviting contemplation and introspection. The entire house is lined inside with chestnut wood calcined with the Japanese Shou Sugi Ban technique, creating a special, simple and cozy atmosphere that is reminiscent of Zen temples, in symbiosis with nature. The property on the ground floor opens through a large entrance, open to a cozy living room that in turn communicates with the dining room integrated into the kitchen. In addition, a large bedroom and a full bathroom allow for full living on the ground floor. At the end of the microcement staircase with talcum stone, we access the upper floor of the house where we have 3 bedrooms (the master bedroom was divided into two after the last renovation) and another bathroom. Geothermal provides the energy to the home for the underfloor heating system and hot water. The property has a large plot of approximately 2,400 m2 with trees and a fantastic south-facing terrace with views of the lake to enjoy nature in your own home. In short, a unique and special property in Navacerrada. IMPORTANT: The original property has a plot of approximately 5,000 m2 that includes large open spaces with trees and native vegetation, a large swimming pool and a guest house. Currently it has been segregated into 3 plots: the house presented with a 2,376 m2 plot, a second plot of 1,247 m2 and a third plot of 1,480 m2 that includes the pool and the guest house, but it could be considered to acquire it together with the property and your plot, the other two properties (price to be agreed upon).

InmoGil Gestión puts at your exclusive disposal a 4-story building in the town of Navacerrada, Madrid, currently operating and dedicated to a bar-restaurant. Spacious and well located, with more than 500 m2 built, distributed over four floors above ground. It has two terraces to serve customers, a bar-restaurant area with tables for 50 people apart from the main dining room for 100 more people, 2 fully equipped kitchens, 2 living quarters and a lower deck area. Distribution: (possibility of installing an elevator) Ground floor: 2 outdoor terraces, large bar with tables for more than 50 people, kitchen to serve this floor, bathrooms and storage area. First floor: Reception, living room, large kitchen and bar area. Second floor: 2 independent homes, one with 3 bedrooms and the other with 2. An independent room for staff rest. Undercover floor: Which is used as a storage area and has a wood oven for roasts. This property has the possibility of changing its use and dedicating it to another activity. Inmogil Gestión is available to resolve any questions and offer clients for your home if you are thinking of selling it. INMOGIL GESTION DOES NOT CHARGE FEES FROM THE BUYER SO THE PRICE REFLECTED IS THE REAL PRICE. “ANOTHER WAY OF DOING THINGS. ”.

In the middle of nature in the center of the town of Navacerrada and just 50 meters from the reservoir, with unique views of Maliciosa and Bola del Mundo. The house of more than 600 square meters with large walls distributed on two floors with many spaces and many possibilities to configure it to suit each one, 9 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms and two living rooms with fireplace This emblematic property has a 2000 square meter plot with a large 20 meter long pool. A wonderful house in one of the most beautiful villages in the Sierra de Madrid. Due to its uniqueness, views and location, it makes this property a unique house. Visit it, you will love it….

**^SPECTACULAR ALPINE TYPE CHALET WITH UNBEATABLE VIEWS IN THE PRESTIGIOUS URBANIZATION REAJO DEL ROBLE^**^ The house combines modern design inside, with a façade respecting the external environment and the landscape of the area. On a large wooded plot of more than 3,800 m2, is this Spectacular villa of almost 600 m2. The house is comfortably distributed in 3 floors. The main floor has a front terrace from which we can enjoy one of the best views of the mountain, Bola del Mundo and the reservoir. By accessing the house, we have an open entrance hall, a living-dining room with a fireplace double height, kitchen and room on the ground floor with bathroom en suite. The upper floor is the jewel in the crown, the plant is distributed in such a way that from its windows we have spectacular views of the Navacerrada Reservoir. In it we have an office, an en-suite room and an open living room to the living room The ground floor of the house has an interior patio, machine room, laundry room, garage, cinema room and a complete service apartment or visits. The house has underfloor heating, smooth walls, has security windows and thermal insulation, electric shutters, thermostat by rooms, all kinds of details… We know that this house is special, because both the house and its surroundings are for someone who knows how to value the quality of nature and who is a lover of peace. Do not hesitate to contact us, we make sure you enjoy your new home. ^**^This announcement is not binding and may contain errors. It is shown for informational purposes and is not contractual^**^ *** WE DO NOT CHARGE COMMISSION TO THE BUYER.

We want to present you this semi-detached house with fantastic views of the Madrid Sierra, you can see such emblematic places as the Valley of the Fallen, the Maliciosa Peak, the Ball of the World, seven peaks. It is located on a plot of 327 square meters in the Reajo del Roble Urbanization, with a garden surrounded by arizónicas, which has a rest area and a swimming pool that will delight the inhabitants of the house. The house is distributed over three floors, in the basement we have a storage room for gardening tools and a wine cellar. The main floor consists of a closed parking area, access to the house, hall-distributor, fitted kitchen, guest toilet and a living-dining room with large windows and views of the mountains. On the upper floor we have four bedrooms and a bathroom, the master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom. From the living room we access through a terrace to the garden area through a staircase and we find a porch ideal for eating on summer days. The property is located close to the municipalities of Navacerrada, Collado Mediano and Becerril de la Sierra, close to the Navacerrada reservoir, sky stations, hiking trails, natural pools, restaurants, supermarkets, sports areas. It is worth highlighting the perimeter enclosure of the first floor with recently installed tilt-and-turn windows, with double glazed glass and thermal break. The access door to the house is armored. The urbanization has 24-hour security service and access control. The house has a central heating system with natural gas and has a French fireplace in the living room.

Semi-detached house in Navacerrada. Housing located in one of the best urbanizations in Navacerrada, very close to the urban center and in a very quiet environment. Urbanization with a beautiful well-kept community garden and green areas with two swimming pools, one for adults and one for children. The house is distributed over two floors + fully finished attic. Ground floor: Private terrace to enjoy the tranquility of the area in summer, hall, living room with wood-burning fireplace with cassette, open kitchen connected to the living room and very bright, the kitchen has a large storage capacity and a toilet. First floor: intended for the rest area, it has a hallway, three very spacious bedrooms and a complete bathroom with a shower.The master bedroom is very spacious and bright and has direct access to a terrace. Attic: Large room dressed in wood, completely isolated, with two Velux that provide light.Currently it is a large bedroom for guests, although it can be used as best as appropriate, games room, office, gym... it also has a full bathroom with a shower. The house has a communal parking space and a large rear. Navacerrada, a beautiful mountain town that has everything, hiking trails, close to the ski resort, a reservoir and, above all, a lot of atmosphere on the weekends and very good places to eat and have a snack. Discover a privileged environment to live… WE DO NOT CHARGE FEES TO THE BUYER WE HELP WITH FINANCING IF YOU NEED IT.

Tailorkey presents this unique semi-detached house, with premium qualities, double glazed glazing, aerothermal energy, gas heating, fireplace with cassette, blinds, solid wood floors, designer toilets, sauna, alarm, etc. It has at least 5 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, living room with fireplace, kitchen with dining room, attic, pantry, patios and garden, gym, sauna and large garage. Located in the heart of the town of Navacerrada. On the ground floor there is a hall, a large independent living-dining room with fireplace, the kitchen, also with space for a dining room, and both with direct access to a private garden, a bathroom and a room or bedroom. On the first floor there are three more bedrooms and two bathrooms, one of them en suite. The second floor also has an open-plan loft of about 50 square meters that can be used as a multipurpose space, such as a bedroom, study or living room. The semi-basement floor currently has a gym with a sauna that can be used as an office or bedroom, a bathroom and a patio, as well as an 80 m2 garage with access from the street and automatic doors. The town of Navacerrada, a beloved classic in the Sierra del Guadarrama of Madrid, has large green areas, has a large amount of services, leisure, supermarkets, pharmacies, etc. It is perfectly connected to the A-6 and has several bus stops and 15 minutes from the Cercanías train. At Tailor & Key we are specialized in the Madrid residential market. We offer a comprehensive and personalized service, accompanying our clients throughout the different phases of the real estate cycle, in purchase-sale operations, rentals and comprehensive home renovations. If you are interested in this property or want to receive additional information about our services, do not hesitate to contact us or go to our tailorkey website. com.

description: Discover the exclusivity of NAVABLANCA! Your new home in the middle of nature, Navacerrada. Navablanca is an exclusive project of 26 semi-detached single-family homes and an independent villa with careful architecture, with large private gardens and a magnificent community pool. Every detail has been designed to offer you a distinguished and comfortable lifestyle. Excellent location It has a privileged location just 45 km from the center of Madrid, with wonderful views of the Navacerrada reservoir and the majestic Madrid mountain range.Navablanca offers the perfect combination between the tranquility of nature and the comfort of urban life. For ski lovers, Navablanca is a dream come true.Its strategic proximity to the Navacerrada ski resort gives you the opportunity to enjoy the passion for winter sports without giving up the comfort of your home. Design and Comfort A project specially designed to make the most of energy, providing great warmth in all its rooms. The quality of the materials used becomes a hallmark of elegance and durability.The interior spaces flow effortlessly, creating a feeling of spaciousness and comfort. A project that is harmoniously integrated into an idyllic environment, inviting you to enjoy moments of relaxation and connection with nature. Unique homes One of the differential values ​​of the projects managed by Grupo IBOSA is the personalization of the homes in terms of distribution and finishes, therefore, in Navablanca you will have a home that adapts to your tastes and lifestyle, because each home like each client, is unique.

NAVACASA SELLS. - ARE YOU ONE OF THOSE WHO APPRECIATE QUALITY, PERSONALITY AND DETAILS? This fantastic property will surprise you! We present you a magnificent INDEPENDENT CHALET in the CENTER of NAVACERRADA. The house undoubtedly has its own, unique style. It has 365 m2 on 2 comfortable levels. It offers us everything we need to live in it, with 5 wonderful suites with air conditioning, guest toilet, large living room with different environments and FIREPLACE, with access to the outside, where you can enjoy moments of relaxation, meals and meetings with family and friends. Light is the absolute protagonist of each space, thanks to the South orientation and the large windows. Spacious fully equipped kitchen, also connected to the TERRACE and the GARDEN. In addition, it has a large GARAGE, 2 PORCHES, boiler room, laundry room, WAREHOUSE and a practical STORAGE ROOM and toilet in the garden area. As for the plot, it has the ideal size: 1000 m2, perfectly designed with consolidated trees, garden, POOL and different areas of enjoyment for everyone. If to all this, we add the magnificent QUALITIES with which it has been built and finished (noble woods in the interior carpentry and blown glass, aluminum windows, rustic terracotta floors in 3 portions, Runtal radiators, Viessmann boiler, electric blinds, tc), this could become the house you always DREAMED OF. WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR TO SEE IT?

suggestedTexts: {'title': 'Detached house in Calle de las escuelas, 3'}
description: CARMEN5-SELL; Magnificent villa located on a plot of 2133m2 and located in an unbeatable place. The property is distributed in two floors: First floor with living room - dining room with fireplace views and exit to the garden, kitchen, 2 double bedrooms with fitted wardrobes, a full bathroom and garage for several vehicles. Second floor with a distributor, three double bedrooms with built-in wardrobes (one of them with access to a fantastic terrace with views of the reservoir) and a complete bathroom. The house is equipped with piped natural gas heating, aluminum windows with wooden gates and shutters. The plot is landscaped, has a swimming pool (currently in disuse) and a well.

Chance! Sale of a unique, spectacular and exclusive home in front of the Navacerrada Reservoir. Villa of more than 600 m2 built on a plot of almost 2,000 m2. It consists of 2 floors. On the entrance floor to the house we find the living-dining room with fireplace and access to the terrace, guest toilet, kitchen with laundry area, two bedrooms that share a bathroom, an office and the master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom. On the first floor we have a living room with a fireplace, a games room, 3 bedrooms and a bathroom. Individual heating by natural gas. 20 meter pool, garden, garage, and storage rooms. Construction from 1980 with large stone walls. The house needs renovation and is ideal to update and convert it into a luxury home in one of the most sought-after and sought-after areas of the Madrid mountains. A few minutes from the center of the town of Navacerrada and next to the Reservoir. In the best urbanization of Navacerrada. Better see! To arrange a visit you can contact Patricia at number 609/112/588.

suggestedTexts: {'title': 'Detached house in Calle del Doctor Miguel Antón'}
description: ARROYO & VILLENA sells Detached stone house, in one of the best areas of Navacerrada, with views of the Navacerrada reservoir, close to the center but far away at the same time to feel the tranquility of the area. The house was built in 1978 and is currently renovated. It consists of a beautiful garden with automatic irrigation that separates several rooms, with a rear entrance to the property, a playhouse for children, a large and spacious storage room and a garage with a separate entrance. In the garden we have a beautiful, very atypical pool. All this on a plot of 1572m². The house with medieval details is distributed over 3 floors: - MAIN FLOOR: living-dining room with fireplace, with access to a beautiful terrace with views of the pool and the Navacerrada reservoir. 3 bedrooms, one of them with an en-suite bathroom, and another separate bathroom with a bathtub. - FIRST FLOOR: 5 bedrooms and two full bathrooms, one with a bathtub with a shower tray. - GROUND FLOOR: kitchen-dining room and terrace with views of the garden and pool. The house has had PVC windows with double glazed glass, floors, kitchen, bathroom with shower and terrace off the living room renovated. The heating is individual Diesel with a 1000L tank and new boiler. BILLS: -IBI: €1,236/ANNUAL For more information call us!

Resulting from the segregation of the original 5,000 m2 property and located in a residential area of Navacerrada with typical constructions of the mountains, the property consists of a beautiful plot of almost 1,500 m2 with native vegetation and trees that includes a stone guest house. and slate of 52 m2 and a fantastic pool to enjoy nature in your own home.

CAVALIER SELLS. Magnificent 305m2 Alpine-style villa with 4 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms and a pool on a spectacular 2,717m2 landscaped plot with splendid south orientation. Located in the best area of Navacerrada and READY TO MOVE IN. It also has a beautiful and comfortable independent guest house. This exceptional house was built in 1975 in granite masonry by the best stonemasons in the area, its roof with different slopes made of large-format slate of magnificent quality, following the tradition of the classic houses of the Swiss Alps. The plot enjoys a lush forest with large hundred-year-old trees, a pond and consolidated vegetation surrounding a beautiful granite cobblestone path, which leads us to the main entrance of the house, with a well with plenty of water and automatic irrigation. A wide hall invites us to go to the main floor, accessing the living room with a fireplace and high ceilings and divided into two pleasant rooms, the first intimate and warm in front of the fireplace, and the second bright and open in front of a large window, which allows us to access the beautiful covered porch decorated with comfortable garden furniture. Next to the kitchen we find a large dining room with impressive exposed granite walls where we can enjoy pleasant evenings with friends and family. Also on the main floor we have a spacious suite with a large dressing room and a greenhouse terrace, converted into a bright private room, where you can enjoy reading or music in complete privacy. We access the first floor through a solid oak staircase, where we find four comfortable bedrooms equipped with fitted wardrobes and two complete bathrooms. The house has porcelain and wooden floors, PVC exterior carpentry with thermal break, gas insulating chamber and double security glazing 6+6, heating and hot water by diesel boiler and alarm.

The heating is individual by channeled propane gas, the house has double aluminum windows throughout the house, it has a living room with fireplace and hall, it has built-in wardrobes in both bedrooms (in The main one has two closets, the apartment has 2 bedrooms, 1 full bathroom, the door is made of armored wood and the stoneware floor in all rooms. Home Consulting is a real estate consultancy that opened more than 20 years ago and we have endured, thanks to our know-how, hard work, professionalism and adaptation to new technologies, the crises that have occurred in the real estate sector, in which we have become the reference real estate agency in the northwest mountains of Madrid, the results support us with continuous growth over the last 4 years. suggestedTexts: {'title': 'Terraced house in Calle del Señor Rubio, 4'}
description: NAVACASA SELLS AN EXCLUSIVE UNIQUE OPPORTUNITY IN NAVACERRADA: Town house in the heart of the town of Navacerrada, completely renovated. We finally have that house you've been asking us about for years. That house that has all the essence of the town and that makes you the owner of something unique, which is usually transmitted from generation to generation and never goes on sale. That house that, when you pass by, you think: whose will it be? would you sell it? The property originally dates back to 1950 and has been completely renovated 5 years ago. With the traditional construction of the time we find wide stone walls, wooden beams, clay and wooden floors. The rehabilitation has respected the essence of the property, preserving these traditional elements, as well as the fireplace in the living room with its original tiles, the wooden access door, the wrought iron bars on the door and windows, and the interior carpentry.. . The property is distributed over two floors: on the ground floor we have a large hall/distributor that leads to a large 35 m2 living room with a fantastic fireplace where you can shelter from the cold in winter, in a really cozy space; a large, fully equipped independent kitchen and a guest toilet. On the second floor we have a beautiful hallway with natural light that gives access to 4 double bedrooms with built-in wardrobes and a full bathroom (with the possibility of enlarging the master bedroom and incorporating another en-suite bathroom, sacrificing one of the rooms). In short, a unique opportunity to acquire a property of these characteristics in the center of Navacerrada, completely renovated, with heating and hot water by biomass and with an A energy rating. If your dream is to have a town house in Navacerrada, this is your opportunity.

Welcome to the paradise of life in the Sierra! Molet Inmobiliaria is proud to present this real estate gem in Navacerrada that will surely captivate your senses. Features of the Detached Chalet: Privileged location on a 1,920m2 plot, perfectly flat and adorned with lush trees that seem straight out of a fairy tale. Fun is guaranteed with a large swimming pool to enjoy sunny days, a charming gazebo for special moments, a barbecue area for grill lovers and a spacious outdoor parking for your guests. Space and Comfort: This magnificent chalet is spread over two floors, with the main floor offering a warm and bright welcome in a large circular hall. Admire the splendor in the large living room and dining room that connect to a porch that opens to the garden, providing a perfect space for entertaining and relaxation. The kitchen with breakfast area is designed to meet the needs of any chef, and has an efficient layout. Four bedrooms and three bathrooms offer privacy and comfort for the entire family. Additional Space: On the ground floor, you will discover a garage for two vehicles, a storage room to store treasures and tools, a machine room and an impressive wine cellar perfect for unforgettable meetings, with direct access to the garden. Upgrade Potential: Although this home is a treasure in itself, it offers upgrade opportunities to suit your specific tastes and needs. The spectacular, meticulously maintained garden is a blank canvas for those who wish to unleash their imagination and create their own outdoor oasis. Do you want to live the dream of the Sierra in this dream chalet? Do not wait more! Call us today to learn more and find out how to make this dream a reality. Your future home in Navacerrada awaits you.

NAVACERRADA CONSULTORES INMOBILIARIOS presents this semi-detached house ready to move into, in one of the best urbanizations in Navacerrada. Housing located in the residential complex of 21 chalets "La Barranca", with an excellent location in the urban area of Navacerrada, very close to the reservoir. Flat plot in front and behind the house. The front area with a private patio equipped as a seating area with a barbecue, ideal for the summer, and the rear patio with direct access to the almost 2,000m² community garden with a heated pool. The house is distributed over two floors + finished open-plan attic. Ground floor: hall with air conditioning, living room with wood-burning fireplace and exit to the rear garden, separate kitchen with dining room (renovated, as it was originally a bedroom) the kitchen has a large storage capacity, an air conditioning and access to the garden front where the barbecue area is. There is the possibility of simply reversing this renovation and recovering the bedroom on the ground floor. Bathroom with shower. Closed garage for one car, and parking space within the plot for another. First floor: intended for the rest area, it has a hallway, three double bedrooms and two full bathrooms with a bathtub. The master bedroom is a spectacular suite with a terrace facing south, large built-in wardrobes, a full bathroom, with a window, and a room that can be used as an office, dressing room, gym.. . Attic: the space below deck is a large open-plan room with vélux-type windows; it is currently used as a living room, guest bedroom and leisure and exercise area. It has a lot of light, and the temperature is ideal both in summer and winter thanks to its quality insulation; It is undoubtedly a space with multiple possibilities. It is worth highlighting several of the qualities of this home: - Smooth paint throughout the house. - Porcelanosa ceramic floors on the ground floor. Imitating wood. - Parquet floor on the first floor. - Kitchen: white with solid wood countertop. U-shaped distribution, with multiple storage. - Highest quality enclosures for optimal insulation of the home. Tilt-and-turn PVC. - Reinforced door. - Interior oak carpentry. - Perimeter fencing and facades of the house in stone and monolayer. Discover another rhythm of life.. . You can contact NAVACERRADA REAL ESTATE CONSULTANTS. Ref. : AV1175 for more information and to arrange a visit to the home. [IW].

NAVACERRADA CONSULTORES INMOBILIARIOS presents this apartment with 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms to move into. With terrace, garage, storage room and two swimming pools. Located in the center of Navacerrada. This exclusive 98m² home has an entrance hall with a courtesy closet, a 25m² living-dining room with a fireplace with cassette and a large terrace with an awning and built-in outdoor cabinets, very practical for storage (firewood, cleaning supplies, etc. ). Separate kitchen with window (equipped with mosquito net). Piped gas boiler for heating and ACS. From the entrance, the corridor leads to a second distributor that gives access to the rest area, which consists of three rooms with a/c and two bathrooms. Two of the bedrooms are double and the third is single, currently used as an office. The two bathrooms are complete and equipped with a bathtub. Natural light throughout the house thanks to the good orientation of the block and specifically the living room and the terrace. The apartment is very comfortable both in summer and winter, thanks to its piped gas heating system and the wood-burning fireplace with cassette. Wooden floors in all rooms (except kitchen and bathrooms) and smooth walls throughout the house. Building in good condition. Urbanization with well-kept common areas and two community pools. Concierge, automatic intercoms and gardening. Garage space and separate storage room included in the sale price. The garage is very comfortable as it has two entrances from two streets (Tr. ª Santísimo and C/ Cuartel). Discover another rhythm of life.. . You can contact NAVACERRADA REAL ESTATE CONSULTANTS. **MSPROPERTIES** OFFERS FANTASTIC IN NAVACERRADA**/(FOR SALE)** Don't miss the opportunity to live in this beautiful apartment in one of the best areas of the city! suggestedTexts: {'title': 'Semi-detached house in Paseo de los Españoles, 16'}
description: We present to you a gem from Navacerrada's catalog of protected assets.A unique property, with vernacular architecture, built in stone and with a significant exterior access staircase to the terrace and second floor of the building.Located in the center of town, next to all services, it is distributed over 2 floors of 106 m2 each (cadastre), with independent access from the street.The house needs to be rehabilitated (comprehensive renovation). A great opportunity to acquire a unique historical property in the center of Navacerrada.

NAVACERRADA CONSULTORES INMOBILIARIOS presents this semi-detached house for sale, located in "Las Rocas", an exclusive residential development with only 8 homes, overlooking the Navacerrada reservoir. It is a comfortable home that enjoys absolute privacy (as if it were independent) thanks to its architectural design and perimeter fencing. It is distributed in two main mezzanines plus a large garage. The main floor consists of an entrance hall with a closet and a courtesy toilet, a living room with two different areas, a wood-burning fireplace (two-sided glass hearth) and a 25m² terrace with a barbecue integrated into the façade, a dining room, a cellar, an independent kitchen with a large office (with service door to the garden), very large multipurpose room (which could be a bedroom on the ground floor), bathroom with shower and storage room. On the upper mezzanine, used as a rest area, the house has 4 very spacious double bedrooms, two of them with large windows facing the reservoir and the surrounding oak groves.All bedrooms have fitted wardrobes.On the same floor there are two full bathrooms with windows, the main one en suite.The house is equipped with storage spaces in strategic areas of the house for a more comfortable life. The garage, for 3 cars, has an entrance at street level (by C/ de los Robles), has an automatic door with remote control, a toilet and communicates with the house through a staircase (this is the only house in the urbanization that has this expansion).In addition, at the access via C/ Lucero they have a parking area for several more vehicles, for almost exclusive use (as it is a street with a cul-de-sac). The private garden of approximately 300m² has several different areas, a meadow with well-adapted select plants, clumps of hydrangeas, rose bushes, holly, palm trees, yews, cedars, perimeter hedge for greater privacy.Part of the garden is tiled (about 80m²) being a very comfortable space for meetings and family celebrations.Next to the house there is a magnificent community garden with a swimming pool, meadows, a grove of oak trees, a tennis court and some rocks with a viewpoint to enjoy the sunsets. With impressive views, and all the services available, it is the ideal home to live regularly or spend a few days off in a privileged area of the Sierra de Madrid. Plot surface: 461m² Constructed area: 351m² Community expenses: €191/month; Private garden maintenance (optional): €75/month. IBI 2022: €894.21 You can contact NAVACERRADA REAL ESTATE CONSULTANTS.Ref.: AV1146 for more information and to arrange a visit to the house.
